# Rails 7.0 Example

This app was generated with the following command:

```
bundle exec rails new . \
  --skip-git \
  --skip-keeps \
  --skip-action-mailer \
  --skip-action-mailbox \
  --skip-action-text \
  --skip-active-storage \
  --skip-action-cable \
  --skip-jbuilder \
  --skip-test \
  --skip-system-test \
  --skip-bootsnap
```
